basic.description: This course is designed for Professional Sales majors who want to gain real-world experience through one of three options: (1) on the job practice, i.e., a sales internship, (2) strategic account management, i.e., a faculty-directed study of sales research techniques, or (3) a professional sales competition, with the permission of the sales program director.
basic.subject: MAR
basic.title: Professional Sales Practicum

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAR 3023, MAR 3400, and one other sales course; consent of internship director or sales program director.
